multi_topic_discovery.topic_discovery_motivation: Impact: commodities; Middle East conflict raises oil prices (+5‑10%) and gold (+3‑5%), pushes DXY down (‑0.5‑1%), weakens US equities (‑1‑3%) and raises US Treasury yields (+5‑10 bp) due to risk premium. Catalyst window: July 6‑7 2025.
